name: You are the Shopkeeper in an RPG
name_original: You are the Shopkeeper in an RPG
description:
You are the Shopkeeper in an RPG

Play as a shopkeeper in an RPG. Buy materials and craft items to aid travelers in need, use your cunning wit to haggle with the adventurers that come your way, and earn enough gold to pay the weekly rent, all while keeping up with the happenings in town. Don't forget to turn on sound!

Crafting sound effect attrition: https://freesound.org/people/newagesoup/sounds/383625/
